# Text containing literal env var values from env.yaml
# These should be redacted when --filter=values is enabled

# Explicit env var name matches
Loading config with GITHUB_TOKEN: test_gh_token_value_1234567890
Anthropic key is test_anthropic_key_abcdefgh
Using OpenAI: test_openai_key_xyz123456
Slack integration: test_slack_token_99887766
DB URL: postgres://user:testdbpass@localhost/db

# Suffix pattern matches
App secret = myappsecret_value_here
Service password: servicepassword123!@#
Custom token stored: customtoken_abcdefghij
Internal API: internalapikey_99999
SSH key contents: ssh_private_key_contents
OAuth auth value: oauth_auth_credential_xyz
API credential: api_credential_string_123

# Edge cases
Minimum length secret: exactly8
Special chars: p@$$w0rd!#%^&*()_+-=[]{}|

# This pattern token should NOT be redacted with --filter=values
Also has GitHub PAT: ghp_aBcDeFgHiJkLmNoPqRsTuVwXyZ0123456789
